channel.title: HAM help!
channel.description: Yea I made my server and stuff and I can run it and all that, but this isn't about the server. The Hamachi turns off my firewall and is on all users of my computer...how can I make it so it doesn't turn off the firewall and is only on my user?

item.title: HAM help!
item.dc:creator: @Amerks5 Amerks5
item.description:
@Amerks5 wrote:

ITs only in the start menu…and my dad is the Admin of our comp and if I delete it from his, it deletes it from everyone and I think Mopar is shutting off my firewall

Read full topic

item.title: HAM help!
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Umm. Delete the shortcuts int the other user’s.
And it shouldn’t shut off your fire-wall…

Read full topic
